name: Default Data Loader
semantic_context: Load data from previous step in the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Default Data Loader 节点。主要用于: Load data from previous step in the workflow

notice.displayName: This will load data from a previous step in the workflow. Example
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This will load data from a previous step in the workflow. Example

dataType.name: dataType
dataType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type of Data | 默认值: json | (必填项)
available_options: JSON (值: json) - Process JSON data from previous step in the workflow
Binary (值: binary) - Process binary data from previous step in the workflow

jsonMode.name: jsonMode
jsonMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: allInputData | (必填项)
available_options: Load All Input Data (值: allInputData) - Use all JSON data that flows into the parent agent or chain
Load Specific Data (值: expressionData) - Load a subset of data, and/or data from any previous step in the workflow

binaryMode.name: binaryMode
binaryMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: allInputData | (必填项)
available_options: Load All Input Data (值: allInputData) - Use all Binary data that flows into the parent agent or chain
Load Specific Data (值: specificField) - Load data from a specific field in the parent agent or chain

loader.name: loader
loader.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Format | 默认值: auto | (必填项)
available_options: Automatically Detect by Mime Type (值: auto) - Uses the mime type to detect the format
CSV (值: csvLoader) - Load CSV files
Docx (值: docxLoader) - Load Docx documents
EPub (值: epubLoader) - Load EPub files
JSON (值: jsonLoader) - Load JSON files
PDF (值: pdfLoader) - Load PDF documents
Text (值: textLoader) - Load plain text files

jsonData.name: jsonData
jsonData.description: Drag and drop fields from the input pane, or use an expression
jsonData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Drag and drop fields from the input pane, or use an expression | (必填项)

binaryDataKey.name: binaryDataKey
binaryDataKey.description: The name of the field in the agent or chain’s input that contains the binary file to be processed
binaryDataKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: The name of the field in the agent or chain’s input that contains the binary file to be processed | 默认值: data | (必填项)

textSplittingMode.name: textSplittingMode
textSplittingMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Splitting | 默认值: simple | (必填项)
available_options: Simple (值: simple) - Splits every 1000 characters with a 200 character overlap
Custom (值: custom) - Connect a custom text-splitting sub-node

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: pointers (值: None) - Pointers to extract from JSON, e.g. "/text" or "/text, /meta/title"
separator (值: None) - Separator to use for CSV
column (值: None) - Column to extract from CSV
splitPages (值: None) - Whether to split PDF pages into separate documents
metadata (值: None) - Metadata to add to each document. Could be used for filtering during retrieval
